  "description": "Changeroom was established in 2012 with a vision to produce quality human resource solutions. We plan to achieve this by partnering with our clients to provide highly specialized consulting services in the areas of human resources development and business management services. Our partnership approach affords us the opportunity of working with you to find the most efficient and appropriate solutions to meet your short, medium and long-term goals. In partnering with your organization, we make it our business to understand your business, embrace its values, aims and objectives.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Accountant

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos

Requirements


	A Degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field.
	A minimum of 3-5 years of experience in accounting, Preferably in an educational institution.
	Professional certification( eg ICAN, ACCA) is an added advantage.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to:&nbsp;bola@changeroom.ng&nbsp;and&nbsp;ginika@changeroom.ng&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

Accountant Job at the Changeroom




        
    

        
        Changeroom was established in 2012 with a vision to produce quality human resource solutions. We plan to achieve this by partnering with our clients to provide highly specialized consulting services in the areas of human resources development and business management services. Our partnership approach affords us the opportunity of working with you to find the most efficient and appropriate solutions to meet your short, medium and long-term goals. In partnering with your organization, we make it our business to understand your business, embrace its values, aims and objectives.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Accountant

Job Location: Lagos

Requirements
     

            
    




	A Degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field.
	A minimum of 3-5 years of experience in accounting, Preferably in an educational institution.
	Professional certification( eg ICAN, ACCA) is an added advantage.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to: bola@changeroom.ng and ginika@changeroom.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Human Resources Manager",
  "description": "Sweet Nation Foods Limited is a fast-growing manufacturer and distributor of specialty snacks to the Retail and Food-service industries.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Human Resources Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Abuja (FCT)&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time
Work Days: Mondays to Saturdays

Responsibilities


	Create Human Resource Systems and Structures
	Recruitment of talent by preparing job descriptions, posting ads and managing the entire hiring process.
	Create and implement effective onboarding plans
	Develop training and development plans
	Develop and provide counseling on policies and procedures
	Assist in performance management processes
	Maintain employee records in line with company policies
	Support the management of disciplinary and grievances issues


Requirements


	Minimum of four (4) years of proven experience in the field of Human Resources.
	Human Resource Cerfitications and Educational Background
	Knowledge of HR functions
	Proficiency in MS Office applications: MS Word, MS Excel, MS Powerpoint
	Outstanding organizational and time-management abilities
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
	High level of integrity and ethics.


Salary
N350,000 - N450,000 monthly

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;hr@worldofpopcornandtreats.com&nbsp;using &quot;Applicant Name, HR Manager, Current city of Residence&quot; as subject of the mail. Example: John Doe, HR Manager, Abuja.

Note


	All Aplicants must currently reside within FCT.
	Applications from outside will not be considered.
",

  "validThrough": "2025-10-01",

    "name": "Sweet Nation Foods Limited"
    
  },

  },

Human Resources Manager Job at Sweet Nation Foods Limited




        
    

        
        Sweet Nation Foods Limited is a fast-growing manufacturer and distributor of specialty snacks to the Retail and Food-service industries.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Human Resources Manager

Job Location: Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time
Work Days: Mondays to Saturdays

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Create Human Resource Systems and Structures
	Recruitment of talent by preparing job descriptions, posting ads and managing the entire hiring process.
	Create and implement effective onboarding plans
	Develop training and development plans
	Develop and provide counseling on policies and procedures
	Assist in performance management processes
	Maintain employee records in line with company policies
	Support the management of disciplinary and grievances issues


Requirements


	Minimum of four (4) years of proven experience in the field of Human Resources.
	Human Resource Cerfitications and Educational Background
	Knowledge of HR functions
	Proficiency in MS Office applications: MS Word, MS Excel, MS Powerpoint
	Outstanding organizational and time-management abilities
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
	High level of integrity and ethics.


Salary
N350,000 - N450,000 monthly

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@worldofpopcornandtreats.com using "Applicant Name, HR Manager, Current city of Residence" as subject of the mail. Example: John Doe, HR Manager, Abuja.

Note


	All Aplicants must currently reside within FCT.
	Applications from outside will not be considered.
    

    

        Click here to Apply
